external_games.name: Meet Cute: A Sweet New Chapter

name: Meet Cute: A Sweet New Chapter
summary: James, a mid-30s city professional, leaves behind the stress of his corporate life to start fresh in the countryside. Struggling to adapt to the slower pace and unfamiliar ways of rural living, he meets Emily, a spirited and kind-hearted baker who takes him under her wing. As she introduces him to the quirks and charms of small-town life, their connection deepens. Together, they embark on an unexpected partnership that challenges them to embrace vulnerability, rediscover joy, and lean on each other. Along the way, James learns that sometimes the simplest things—community, creativity, and love—can lead to the most profound transformations.
